projects.title: Recipes sharing platform with authentication
projects.description: Made using ReactJS for the front-end and Firebase for the data storage. This project includes full CRUD functionality using the REST API provided by firebase. It is using Google for authentication.

projects.title: Car rental platform
projects.description: Made with he MERN stack. Features an admin and a customer roles. Administrators can add cars and manage reservations, which users can simply make. The app is not yet completely done, more features incoming!
